card.name: Alphadios, Lord of Spirits
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Angel Commands. ■ Players can't summon creatures other than light creatures or cast spells other than light spells. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Terror Pit
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Auzesu, Demonic Elemental
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Sympathy ■ Whenever one of your Angel Commands or Demon Commands attacks, destroy one of your opponent's tapped creatures. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Super Spark
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.

card.name: King Alcadeias, Holy Gaia
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Evolution—Put on one of your multicolored creatures. ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever your opponent would put a non-multicolored creature into the battle zone, put it into their graveyard instead.

card.name: Diamond Glorius, Light Divine Dragon
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, ignore any effects that prevent your other creatures from attacking your opponent this turn. ''(For example, ignore summoning sickness and card effects that say "This creature can't attack" or "This creature can't attack players". Your creatures can't attack creatures this way.)'' ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Super Trash Train, Fuuma Devil
card.text: ■ Whenever another creature is destroyed, you may draw a card.

card.name: Bloody Shadow, Mystic Light Death Knight
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Gravity Zero ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature wins a battle, destroy it.

card.name: Dark Soul Creation
card.text: ■ You may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, draw 3 cards.

card.name: Queen Alcadeias, Holy Gaia
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Evolution—Put on one of your multicolored creatures. ■ Your opponent can't cast spells other than multicolored spells. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Gregorias, Mystic Light Death Saint
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a Knight from your graveyard to your hand. ■ This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Nero Gryphis, Mystic Light Emperor
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Blocker ■ Whenever one of your Knight creatures is destroyed, you may cast a light or darkness Knight spell or a light or darkness spell from your hand that has "shield trigger" that costs 6 or less For No Cost ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Murmur, Vizier of Formation
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Each of your other creatures in the battle zone that have "blocker" gets +3000 power.

card.name: Spell Del Fin, Light Divine Dragon
card.text: ■ Your opponent plays with their hand Face Up ■ This creature gets +2000 power for each spell in your opponent's hand. ■ Your opponent can't cast spells. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Bega, Vizier of Shadow
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. Then discard a card at random from your opponent's hand.
